articles.author: Jamiel Lynch
articles.title: Little Rock schools will allow African American class to count for graduation, in break from Arkansas state officials - CNN
articles.description: In a sharp break from Arkansas education officials, the Little Rock School District said in a news release it will offer AP African American Studies for credit.
articles.content:
In a sharp break from Arkansas education officials, the Little Rock School District said in a news release it will offer AP African American Studies for credit.
